name: song
description:
This is a game for the RNJam.

The random name that was generated was 'song' and this game incorporates the optional themes of minimalist, random and a wall.

Its a bit abstract and strange so here are some instructions:

The grid consists of walls arrows and moving squares. The three squares represent the drums, bass and melody for the song. When they pass over a coloured tile a note is played.

The top left has a sequence, it shows the order that the moving squares must pass over notes to start the lyrics. 

Left click to change grey tiles to coloured notes, click repeatedly to change the note. Right click to remove a note. Complete the sequence to start the lyrics, complete one verse of the lyrics to move to the next level.

The lyrics t the songs are generate using a markov chain loaded with Shakepeare's sonnets and can continue forever in the unlikely event that you are enjoying the song.
